AdminProfile.title: AdminProfile
AdminProfile.description: Represents an administrator profile within the Homie Stays application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AdminProfile entity.

creationDate.description: Date and time the admin profile was created.

lastLogin.description: Date and time of the administrator's last login.

permissions.description: List of permissions granted to the administrator.

definition.description: Stores admin profile information. The `adminId` path parameter must match the authenticated user's UID. This path enables simple, secure read/write access controlled by the user's authentication status.

params.name: adminId
params.description: The unique identifier of the admin user, matching the Firebase Authentication UID.

definition.description: Indicates that a user is an admin.  This enables global admin role checks in security rules using `exists()` without reading profile data.

params.name: uid
params.description: The unique identifier of the user (Firebase Authentication UID).

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to securely manage admin profiles using a path-based ownership model. This approach provides authorization independence and facilitates secure list operations.

**Authorization Independence:** Admin profiles are stored under the `/admin_profiles/{adminId}` path. Authorization is based solely on the `adminId` matching the `request.auth.uid`. There's no reliance on data from other documents to determine access.

**Structural Segregation:** Admin profiles are stored in a dedicated collection (`/admin_profiles`), ensuring a homogeneous security posture. All documents in this collection share the same security requirements (only the admin can access their profile).

**Access Modeling:** Path-based ownership is used (`/admin_profiles/{adminId}`).

**QAPs:**
*   Secure `list` operations are supported because authorization is based on the `adminId`, preventing unauthorized access to profiles.
*   The structure avoids using rules as filters, ensuring that list operations are secure and efficient.
